text: Keiko Sofía Fujimori Higuchi (; ; born 25 May 1975). (also known by the pseudoyms Señora K (Mrs. K), Ruth and "La chica") is a Peruvian politician. She is the daughter of former Peruvian President Alberto Fujimori. After the divorce of her parents, she was First Lady from 1994 to 2000, becoming the youngest First Lady in the history of the Americas. In 2006, she was elected to the Congress of Peru. Fujimori leads the right-wing party Fuerza Popular and was their presidential candidate in the 2011 election runoff, the 2016 election runoff and the 2021, losing each times. In 2021 she lost to educator Pedro Castillo by 60,000 votes. Fujimori was said to be involved in the Odebrecht scandal and was arrested in Peru on 10 October 2018. ==References== Category:1975 births Category:Living people Category:First Ladies of Peru Category:Peruvian politicians
title: Keiko Fujimori
